snippet: Members of the fledgling legalized marijuana industry met with about 40 investors in Lower Manhattan to encourage them to enter the cannabis industry.
abstract: Representatives of 18 start-up companies providing services like security, lighting and storage to fledgling legalized marijuana industry meet with about 40 potential investors in Lower Manhattan; entrepreneurial group hopes to encourage investment in cannabis industry at time when 19 states have legalized use of marijuana for medical purposes.
lead_paragraph: Members of the fledgling legalized marijuana industry met with about 40 investors in Lower Manhattan to encourage them to enter the cannabis industry.

headline.main: Trying to Sell Wall Street on the Value of Marijuana
headline.print_headline: Trying to Sell Wall Street On the Value Of Marijuana
